0.Major_Activities1:
To establish and run orphanages in the region.
To find, adopt and provide education to children in dire need of social security.
To provide orphaned children, opportunity to interact with the society.
to provide counseling and necessary guidance to orphans.
To provide the children recreational facility for their over all development.
To assist the government in various schemes of social justice for poor and destitute.
To give awareness regarding social justice, ethics and values.
